english.segment1: In the palace in the land of mercy. The King looked out from His throne. He saw the sick and the homeless and hungry. He saw me lost and without hope. And moved with compassion. He sent out His only Son. With the invitation to come
english.segment2: This is your invitation. Come just the way you are. Come find what your soul has been longing for. Come find your peace. Come join the feast. Come in, this is your invitation
english.segment3: So I stood outside the gates and trembled. In my rags of unworthiness. Afraid to even stand at a distance. In the presence of holiness. But just as I turned to go. The gates swung open wide. And the King and His only Son. They invited me inside
english.segment4: This is your invitation. Come just the way you are. Come find what your soul has been longing for. Come find your peace. Come join the feast. Come in, this is your invitation
english.segment5: So now will you come with me. To where the gates swing open wide. The King and His only Son. Are inviting us inside
english.segment6: This is our invitation. Come sinner as you are. Come find what your soul has been longing for. Come find your peace. Come join the feast. Come in, this is your invitation. This is our invitation. This is the invitation.
